subject: Order #SSN3520
description_text:
Hello

I order your pedals 11days ago and on the website it says the order is
confirmed but still hasnt been sent yet. Can you please give me an update?
is the order being prepared at all?

Yours
Dominik

conversations.body_text: Hi Dominik ≈Åukomski,  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the logistics delay. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with restocking expected to be completed by the 28th. At that time, we will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fees.
